website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced machine that's easy to install and produces great-tasting water.
pros: Machine offers 7 presets for water, producing a range of pH options
Filter (built in) lasts up to 1 year

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE/BACKS THEIR PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit. Purchased new in 2011 and have gotten tremendous use out of it. I think the company was shocked by how many liters of water that had passed through my unit. This company totally backs their products. My unit needed to be serviced after long-time usage. I paid only to ship to Air Water Life and they completely serviced and refurbished my unit to new condition. I am back to using it again. I am completely satisfied and impressed with this company and their 5-star level of service. Thank you Air Water Life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove chlorine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use at my house in brazil. I was very excited to have alkaline water at home but unfortunately the filter doesnt remove the chlorine from the water and it’s impossible to drink it due to the smell. Also the setting for drinking water its not alcaline. In order to get alcaline water i have to use the cooking water option.
customer_reviews.author: ana valle

customer_reviews.title: be sure to find out the true negative feedbacks in the advent you overlook a few
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in a box , you could tell it had been used. The unit had little boxes that had held parts to the unit, no paper work, no warranty registration,no instructions,the unit had water coming out of it . you could tell its been used, will ask for a refund or I will ask to be sent the new unit I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: A Garrett

customer_reviews.title: This is a great investment for a healthy family!
customer_reviews.text: Never tasted water so pure!! Was easy to hook up!! So-long bottled water!!! There's a lot of bottled water out there that is just as bad, if not worse than some tap water... & those that aren't are expensive! This is a great investment for a healthy family! Update; Here we are 10 months 1500 liters later, & I'm please to report all is well & loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Test the water at every use
customer_reviews.text: It seemed okay in the first two weeks then it stopped making alkaline water. Hopefully, the replacement last longer. Test the water at every use to make sure the output is actually alkaline.
customer_reviews.author: Dorel Bancos

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the product, I was able to install it myself, if you have a pull out sprayer for the kitchen faucet, you have to replace it, unless you want it in another room that has a regular faucet. For me it was worth it. Customer Service is 5 star as well, I called Zack about the install,and I talked to Mason concerning “washing” , very informative, very polite, very easy instructions, which causes me to be very happy !
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Well it really goes from aprox 4 of ph until ...
customer_reviews.text: Well it really goes from aprox 4 of ph until 11 However, the initial drinking has a 9.5ph, dicovered because I drank it and had an incredible headache and asked to a friend test it PH. The next level vary between 9.5 ans 10.5 Ok I live in anotger country and my faucet water is already 7.5 PH So the way I found was buy a PH tester and mix acid first level water with initial drinking until achieve a 8 PH. Quite complex Yet I'll ask a third PH and ORP testing to another friend that has a very precise tester to confirm
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Yamazaki

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's well worth buying this. We've been using this for years and still working good All you need is change the filter and descale the machine at least twice a year and you'll have a better tasting water.
customer_reviews.author: HEC3

customer_reviews.title: It does what it set out to so, with 7 different settings, no less!
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent quality seemingly pretty solid unit. Just wish at its price that its makers would create a little more value by making it easier to install on kitchen sinks with a pull-out spay head as the main faucet. This could be accomodated by making an adaptor with the same fitting as many of those sinks use for their spray head if you unscrew part of the spray head, so one isn’t forced t have to figure out how to 3d print their own adaptor or change out their sink!!
customer_reviews.author: MattGuyver

customer_reviews.title: better sleep. I take my water everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and more. Initially I had it plugged into a surge protector and sometimes it produced acidic instead of alkaline water. The directions clearly said to plug it into a GFI plug. Once I did that, it's worked perfectly and effects are noticeable. More energy, calmer digestion, better sleep. I take my water everywhere. Easily installed. No mess. If i can do it, anyone can.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Miracle machine
customer_reviews.text: This is without a shadow of doubt the best purchase I have made in some time. Selection of the cleaning this morning cleaned out the debris from my coffee cup. My wife uses the cleaning solution to clean the kitchen and bathroom. A truly remarkable machine for improving the quality of drinking water by increasing the Ph of the water to the selected value
customer_reviews.author: clupaul

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, great taste and very affordable. We brought a slim water container to refill and keep in fridge so we’d have cold water.
customer_reviews.author: b joli

customer_reviews.title: worked as advised
customer_reviews.text: used product, in 3 months, was off my diabetes and cholesterol medication. my husband A1C went from 6.3 to 5.9 docs very happy. I did not change anything with my diet or exercise so I know it is the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! What a differance
customer_reviews.text: This Ionizer dose what they said it would do. My water taste so good I won't go out and buy water ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super easy to install. I have a PH meter at the winery and it gives the readings it says it should. Why buy a used machine for more money? Buy new, save the money and get a warranty..
customer_reviews.author: Gary Luchtel

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! If you want to have this machine under the counter and/or you have a designer faucet you need to order the adapter kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Toothglo

customer_reviews.title: We haven't had to buy any alkaline water since installing our ionizer!
customer_reviews.text: We love our ionizer! We installed it under our sink with the spigot add-on and it works great! We get consistent 9.5 alkaline water - even months later now. We used to buy several cases of alkaline water each month, but haven't had to since! Thank you for such a great product. :)
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Better pH water tastes better, is better for you and is absorbed by the body easier. But that isn't all this machine filters to water for - you can also choose a slightly more acidic water perfect for cleaning and removing calcium and other stains. I even prepare pH water for my pets as their body and digestive systems can be sensitive. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BOC in PS

customer_reviews.title: It was a piece of cake for me to hook up and works like a charm right beside my kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received my Ionizer awhile ago but only got it hooked up May 26, 2017 because of a combination of trying to get a plumber/professional to install it and working around my employment schedule. It was a piece of cake for me to hook up and works like a charm right beside my kitchen sink. Its a very fine machine.
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Great PH
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it’s promised to do. Ph is consistent. Difficult to find the correct filters by part number.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Draper

customer_reviews.title: Works like a gem and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: everything that we thought it would be. Easy to set up, and easy to operate. The PH of the water is as advertised. I would recommend this product to my friends. My wife has cancer and needs to alkalize her body. This ionizer should do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to have my machine. I enjoy the convenience and all its benefits it offers, shipping was fast, customer service is great thank you so so much
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery! Installation is tricky. Lots of optional ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! Installation is tricky. Lots of optional parts depending on your faucet type. Took me awhile to figure out what I needed and didn't need. Watch out especially for the washers -- they appear to be integrated into a part but they are not, and I needed to pop some of them out to fit it. Also check the internet for videos on the hose installation -- they really need to be pushed in firmly. Once you do all that it is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Willis

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...all household should own one of these. Feel much, much healthier now. Wish i had known about this machine long ago. Grateful for having this in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Thoai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my product thus far. My water taste amazing. I am still in the early drinking stage.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: I feel great and all is well
customer_reviews.text: I use it for drinking, cooking, washing veggies, and for disinfecting surfaces. I feel great and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Michellino

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of this machine and have used my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this machine and have used my sisters which works really well, however ours is not working properly and am not sure who to contact. When it is working and not in wash mode I assume it is doing the job. 😣
customer_reviews.author: lillian

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: I had mine for already over 3 months and the taste of the water is great ! No complaints for the flavor, kinda cheap feeling on the interface, but you dont drink the interface.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago acosta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, been using ours for over a year. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Praying4u

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service along with an Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love my water filter! It was easy to set up and the customer service, when needed, was OUTSTANDING! I have hardly any swelling or joint pain but if I don't drink my Alkaline water I HURT! Oh and the price point was perfect for my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Sits on your counter, very easy to install. Have had it a month and works great. The lines that hook to your faucet are a bit awkward though
customer_reviews.author: K. Larson

customer_reviews.title: ... a little over a year now and I'm very pleased! Water tests well and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I've had the machine for a little over a year now and I'm very pleased! Water tests well and tastes great. Greg, in customer service, has been awesome sauce. He's helped me descale my machine with ease and has sent complimentary items to further ease the situation. No complaints thus far!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Best water !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must get if you drink water all the time , by that I mean at least a gallon a day ! Once I got used to the higher 9ph it was great, no more heartburn since I've been drinking it , helps with wife's headaches as well, we cook with it also , food taste so much better then normal tap water . Very easy to install anyone can do it!!!
customer_reviews.author: George butler

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased and everyone else who's tried the water has good ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased and everyone else who's tried the water has good reports on their reduced acid reflux and better sleep and reduced joint pain. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Herrin

customer_reviews.title: Its been Great, 2 Years old
customer_reviews.text: After 6000 Liters of water and 2 Years old, our Aqua-Ionizer works great, Very easy to use, we just replaced the inner carbon filter for the first time 10/2014, the system was also easy to install, The company has a great staff that answer our questions before and after we purchased our aqua- Ionizer Deluxe 7.0 Water Ionizer.
customer_reviews.author: charles r powell

customer_reviews.title: This unit was touted to be easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This unit was touted to be easy to install, and fit 95% of all faucets. Still trying to get it hooked up to a Delta faucet purchased at Lowes, just for this job
customer_reviews.author: Sid Kleinpeter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice device. Chose to do an undercounter installation
customer_reviews.text: Very nice device. Chose to do an undercounter installation. Installed on city water. Have a primary filtration unit from a dispenser with 3/8" piping. Since the Aqua-Ionizer is 1/4", wetn to Home Depot to purchase a piranha reducing coupling. Installation wnet without a hitch. Using the device per instruction and it is performing geat. We're enjoying the benefits of purified balanced water.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Ph readings are on point. Water tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: RONALD C ANDAYA

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and was good for cooking and drinking
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have Lupus and heard that the water system may help my overall health. So my family decided to try it! Let's just say starting outh, the health water life staff gave me a personal call and offered any help possible with our new system. They have a 10 minute video for installation, my fiancé has no trouble connecting the unit. We have been using the system and the water is refreshing to drink, no chemical smells or bad tastes! We absolutely LOVE our new system and are very pleased to have made the investment! The company gets kiddos for their outstanding customer service, one of a kind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Fugle

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised to receive a call from Greg at Real Spirit USA, the manufacturer of the product to offer his assistance. This made me realize that I was dealing with an outstanding company that stands 'in front" of its product, not just "behind" it, which they do also with an extraordinary warranty. For me, this experience has added a whole new dimension to customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great item at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: I waited a year before writing this review as I wanted to make sure that this item does everything it claimed. it does and at a fraction of the cost of comparable units! easy to install and maintain and it delivers on what it says! I have tested my tap water and also tested it coming out of the Ionizer and the results are close to what it stated, results will always vary depending on the original condition of your water but this unit delivers! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works like a charm. Best part is the excellent customer service when setting it up - I highly recommend this Ionizer.
customer_reviews.author: TomBert

customer_reviews.title: The need to purchase a Water machine without being broken by the bank fostered pyramid schemes.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, directed given on internet video. Test provided convinced me the most that we had made a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lavern Allen

customer_reviews.title: Well built and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I been using my machine for the past 2.5 years with no problems. I occasionally check the PH level and it's always right on. It's an excellent well made machine and use it daily for drinking water and for my baseball 2 gallon jug. Recently I needed a replacement part and Greg was very helpful. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Keno5584

customer_reviews.title: This water machine rates at the top of the list and the best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best unit for the price. I have used it for 4 months now and the water quality and choices are great. The company airwaterlife.com will bend over backwards to make you happy with any product or question you might have. Greg is a true customer service wizard and great guy.
customer_reviews.author: BAW

customer_reviews.title: This machine is fantastic. makes drinking water
customer_reviews.text: This machine is fantastic.makes drinking water, cooking ALKALINE waterat higher values.Auto clean 7 platum plates and no need for expensive filters. Costermer support is A1 and explained to me my small problem alone and explained how it operates. The best price for the money if you are going to use for a life tme. It has already saved me on doctor bills, my wife has a very acid stomach much less not buying Naxium pills. Thanks Gerry
customer_reviews.author: gerhard schweppe

customer_reviews.title: 2500 L and counting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ionizer in Dec of 2012. I am on 2500 L and everything is working as expected. I researched this model (and others) vs the Kangen and didn't see the need to spend the extra money. I am relatively healthy and eat my veggies so I didn't notice any dramatic health differences, but I just like the idea of drinking filtered, ionized water for staying healthy. I actually prefer this water to my RO water that is still hooked up under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product !! No reason to pay thousands , side by side this one measures up in quality and performance against the one that cost $4000. I highly recommend this product if you are concerned about your health and getting your body more alkaline!! Big Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. A must purchase.
customer_reviews.text: With this excellent water ionizer I got water really alkaline. About 9.0 pH initial drinking. The taste is very good and in a few days I have already felt the benefits of drinking it. If your tap water has a low TDS, remember to buy a mineralizing filter too and install it on the ionizer inlet hose to add good minerals and achieve higher alkaline pH. Congratulations to Real Spirit USA to sell this great product and mainly to Greg Kirastoulis for his kindness and professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Carlei Costa Lima

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this ionizer for about a year. It produces ionized water with the proper PH without a hitch. Unlike other ionizers I've owned in the past, this unit is well designed to prevent bug infestation which is a must living in a tropical climate. The automatic cleaning feature is also great! It's a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Rustyhawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Invest in your health~drink ionized water...cook with it too.
customer_reviews.text: Great water ionizer at an affordable price. Customer service is exemplary. Water never tasted so GOOD! My dogs prefer ionized water over filtered and I've noticed a spring in their step too!!! Order yours, you will be glad you did. It is a minimum investment for maximum benefits~
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Service!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the ionizer!! It works as stated!! When we received the unit there was a small crack in the base of the unit - only cosmetic - I called the service # and left a message (it was a weekend). To my surprise I got a phone call first thing Monday morning. The representative (Greg) was very responsive and was willing to take our unit and replace it with one that was not cracked (even though it didn't disrupt the operations of the machine). Ups came and picked up the unit and within a few days the new machine arrived. It was easy to hook up!! I highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dixon

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: we don't have good water here so the filter system keeps us from buying all of our drinking water every week.
customer_reviews.author: william p kleweno

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be all it advertised to be.. easy set up...changing from one setting to another is not working as smooth as I would like, push a button to move the water quality level and sometimessage it changes instantly and sometimes it won't change...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I put mine in our bathroom since we have an in faucet sprayer. The water diverted attachment is better than in the instructional video. Works exactly as expected and even plays music during it's cleaning cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unit very easy to set up. Tested water and it's 9.5. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Deterville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clear cut # 1 choice, with under sink adapter kit.
customer_reviews.author: ryan gibson

customer_reviews.title: I've owned this machine for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It's everything it's advertised to be. We have had it for 2 years. The cleaning mechanism works great. This is a great company to deal with. If you have any questions the respnse is promt friendly and helpful. I have recommended this product to freinds who also purshased it and are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Barmore

customer_reviews.title: great machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy to use no chemicals or plumber to be involved. The customer service is excellent I spoke to Greg he walks you through it and wont let you go until you are happy. To me that is customer service.. i was skeptical at first with the price 895.99. You know the saying you get what you pay for. But without middle men and advertising this is a product consumers can use and enjoy while spreading the greatness by word of mouth . I love my Aqua ionizer thanks for building an affordable machine.
customer_reviews.author: Shuwan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Ionizer purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been an excellent purchase. It has very easy set up and clear controls. It delivers the Ph levels that the settings say and is very easy to use. I have used water from other ionizers and it is very comparable and much more affordable. I have recommended to friends .
customer_reviews.author: Byron G Baule

customer_reviews.title: Water machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Easy to install. Small so it doesn't take up the hold kitchen counter. I love all the settings. I used the cooking setting when cooking a roast in my crock pot. It was the most tender and good flavored. roast I have ever had. I used the purified setting for putting cut flowers in water. They last a long time. Use the cosmetic acidic setting for spraying my face because I have rosasea. I use less med. now on my face. It stops the itching from mos. bites instantly. I could go on and on but I must stop. So glad we purchased this one. It was cheaper than most others.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Clemens

customer_reviews.title: ... machine for over a year and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Have owned the machine for over a year and I am very happy with it. Excellent value for the price and does everthing that the more expensive machines do. I would recommend this machine to anyone looking for a water ionizer.
customer_reviews.author: Damon R.

customer_reviews.title: I had to send the machine back,
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the machine back, It not test well for alkaline water
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: SENT IT BACK
customer_reviews.text: SENT IT BACK could not install it. because the connections to water tubing would not come apart to install the water lines. sent it back with a return label to Amazon. no problem in refund of cost.
customer_reviews.author: ELLIE

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the purchase after reading a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I made the purchase after reading a lot of alkaline benefits to the blood...The version I got have the in/out diverter as shown on the picture..It installs neatly using tie wraps..No hanging hose like the youtube instructional video...
customer_reviews.author: Reyh

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not use ionizer so no take on how it works but it was sent with diverter that has two openings for hoses. Do not like having 2 of them attached to my faucet. Also none of the adapters to connect diverter to faucet fit the faucet I had or the new one I purchased. Be prepared to have to use the large ring with screws. Way too Frankenstein looking for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product for me.
customer_reviews.text: I never actually set up the product before returning it. I did a lot of research on ionizers aftr making the purchase and decided it was not the right product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Charles Halford

customer_reviews.title: 0 is simply the best. I have never enjoyed drinking water so much
customer_reviews.text: The Air water life Aqua - ionizer deluxe 7.0 is simply the best. I have never enjoyed drinking water so much. I feel so refreshed and hydrated since using this product. I sleep better as well. The water is always at the recommended pH balance. The cosmetic pH choice helps my skin feel so clean and my face looks great after each use. Every household should have a Air water life aqua ionizer. It is reasonably priced compared to the over priced ionizers on the market. It is great for your overall health. Simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Be VERY CAREFUL if you do not have a STANDARD ...
customer_reviews.text: Be VERY CAREFUL if you do not have a STANDARD SIZE faucet, otherwise it is difficult trying to hook it up and find specialty valves to connect and convert it. After 2 hours tinkering in Lowes to no avail, and not really having other options, we returned the unit. I cannot speak to the quality of the unit, although it appears to be a great unit and I wish I could have used it. Talk to the people at the company before purchasing, just to make sure you will not have similar issues; they are very personable and willing to help, and appear to be very knowledgeable, and they are easy to get ahold of. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Purchased wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Learned a lot after receiving item. Bottom line is I decided to purchase from a company here and have the major portion of the machine under the sink. Cannot really provide workability of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Jhene C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was not as advertised and was returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: bob tort

customer_reviews.title: My water still tasted like chlorine. I returned for the Kangen Machine and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just didnt trust it. My water still tasted like chlorine. I returned for the Kangen Machine and I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Deprato

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not fit my system or my Dads had to return
customer_reviews.author: Trixie InsideOut

customer_reviews.title: The design is not good, It waste too much water
customer_reviews.text: The design is not good, It waste too much water. I have uninstalled It after a month, Their warranty department not helpful. I wouldn't recommend this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: KCL

customer_reviews.title: love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water machine! When you're away from home you really notice how much you miss it. Customer service is GREAT.... Worth the price, for sure
customer_reviews.author: MelissaW

customer_reviews.title: Mac
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this unit over a year now, and still happy with the unit. I have repeatedly test the PH levels and got great results.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Absoluely brilliant. easy to install and fully automated so all ...
customer_reviews.text: Absoluely brilliant. easy to install and fully automated so all you need to do is drink the perfect water. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is well worth the price! Instructional video on setting up is superb! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best healthy thing that anyone can do for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Perle

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work and you will not be able to return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: BEFORE you buy Google Aqua Aqua Ionizer Deluxe on YouTube video. Here is the link -[...]. A complete unbiased review was done on this ionizer. It only goes up to 9.5 hp. It does not have a negative ORP even on the highest level. Also, there have been so many returns that there is a yellow notice stating not to return to Amazon. The filter contains one stage of filtration and it is carbon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! However, the pH of the water was a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Tarbox

customer_reviews.title: No factory warranty
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but there is no factory warranty. I should have know it was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Powell

customer_reviews.title: Bought a lemon
customer_reviews.text: When we received our aqua ionizer deluxe 7.0 water machine we were excited to start using it. First thing we did was check the alkaline PH. We checked every setting and to our dismay the readings were identical at every setting. Decided to check the acid water and that read exactly the same, checked our tap water the same. Called customer support they tried to get the machine to work properly with no luck! So we ended up sending it back and upgraded to the next. Very dissapointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise mayo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6 months of normal use. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kim

customer_reviews.title: Price of crap. What a huge
customer_reviews.text: Moldy and old. Price of crap. What a huge waste
customer_reviews.author: C Z

customer_reviews.title: Me like
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 18 months, and I love the taste. My health was fine before I bought it, but a friend who bought the same Aqua-Ionizer Deluxe before I did swears it helped her sleep and immune system. And the customer service is top-notch: I somehow over-tightened the faucet adapter to the diverter, then damaged the threads when trying to separate them (to remove calcium buildup due to the local water supply). AirWaterLife's customer support line was happy to send me new parts, even after a year and a half, and even after I offered to pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Man

customer_reviews.title: I like it pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I have been having this machine for about a month. I like it pretty well. Great buy compared to others out there. Another thing that I like about this machine is that the upkeep won't be expensive. The filters cost about $40. Last but not least the customer service is really awesome. If you are looking for a machine to make alkaline water and don't have thousands of dollars to spend I would suggest that you get this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff and the machine seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the machine for a week now, but have discovered the technique for maximizing -ORP by keeping the water flow to a minimum. Good stuff and the machine seems to be good quality. Greg was very helpful with my questions about uses for pH. Amazing customer service. And will update in the future as I can see that after a daily commitment for sometime the benefits will be greater.
customer_reviews.author: Health Conscious

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance and Price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit for 5 years and it has performed flawlessly. I replaced the internal filer twice for over 8000 gallons of water and the taste is still very good. Really like the auto-shut-off filter so that you don't have to turn the water off to change. I have the same thing on my pre-filter so it's a really easy maintenance task. I got the extra sink mounted faucet so it is really convenient and we can run both faucets at once with no problem and the unit is out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Machine works very smoothly and reliably. Only thing that ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine works very smoothly and reliably. I now have an electrical pH tester and the highest alkaline water is coming out at 10.5. Tastes good. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Good starter alkaline water ionizer
customer_reviews.text: The akaline water machine is overall a good machine. Definitely could use some improvements for example No fluoride or chlorine filter but outside of that it’s pretty basic I don’t use all the time just traveling or for a month at a time
customer_reviews.author: j money

customer_reviews.title: No more health problems
customer_reviews.text: I buy 2 in the last 3 years, excellent for health improvement.
customer_reviews.author: FRANZG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we will see if it works like they say time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Water has really improved my health. Medicine is absorbed better. I use this water in all aspects of my life. Cooking, cleaning, hygiene etc..
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: so far I like it, it was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: so far I like it, it was easy to install. and I've tested the water and it is definitley alkali
customer_reviews.author: Victor G

customer_reviews.title: Very good product easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very good product easy to install. I purchased 2 one for me an one for my daughter. It is good tasting water. I save the back wash water or acid water iwhcich is fantastic for cleaning. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Honeys

customer_reviews.title: Great Product,  a must for every home!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an $1800.00 water ionizer with this one because of the extreme cost of filter replacement ($400.00) and no way to physically do a deep cleaning of the plates. This item produces a great 9.5 ph drinking water without the annoying music. My entire family's health has improved, including my pets in two short months. I'll not but another MLM product for my health, I understand why they refused to give me the filter price during my first initial purchase. Everything seems very transparent with this product and company. Although it's a bit costly to add the under sink attachment I plan to add it one day, if I ever meet a nice plumber that can do it reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 years still working perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as stated, high quality. Superior customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm at 3000 litter mark and so far it's been working flawlessly. Water doesn't have any foul odor or taste
customer_reviews.author: Tae K.

product_meta.title: Aqua Ionizer Deluxe 7.0 | Water Ionizer | Alkaline Water Filtration System | Produces pH 4.5-11.0 Alkaline Water | Up to -800mV ORP | 4000 Liters Per Filter | 7 Water Settings
feature_bullets: Antioxidants: Creates molecular hydrogen with micro-clustered water.
7 Settings: 4 Alkaline Ionized – 1 Purified – 2 Acidic Ionized – For use on city water
Advanced Electroplate Technology: 7 platinum coated titanium dipped plates, long-life, durable, and energy-efficient
Features: Variable 4.0 to 11.0 pH; ORP -800mV; Large LCD screen, Limited Lifetime warranty.
Auto-Cleaning: Reverse polarity quick clean after each use and wash cycle every 40L automatically
